cards.title: EU and Mexico criticise Trump's proposed 30% tariff
cards.summary: Mexico criticised what it called Trump's "unfair deal" and insisted its sovereignty was non-negotiable. EU's chief Ursula von der Leyen threatened to take "proportionate countermeasures"

cards.title: The mushroom killer was obsessed with true crime. Now true crime fans are obsessâ€¦
cards.summary: It was in one of Australia's smallest courtrooms that its biggest trial took place. Journalists have descended from around the world to cover her murder trial.

cards.title: Gaza hospital says 24 people killed near aid site as witnesses blame IDF
cards.summary: Israel Defense Forces (IDF) said there were "no known injured individuals" from IDF fire near the site.
